produce an MCMC-based EpiEstim Rt estimate on the 29-day series

Source: R/est_Rt.R
est_Rt.Rd

produce an MCMC-based EpiEstim Rt estimate on the 29-day series

est_Rt(aout)

Arguments

aout

instance of 'Arima_sars2pack' S3 class

Note

Simply uses the tsfull and dates29 components to call EpiEstim::estimate_R

Examples

nyd = nytimes_state_data()
ny = Arima_by_state(nyd, state.in="New York")
ee = est_Rt(ny)

#> Error in source(system.file("MCMCsupport/code.R", package = "sars2app")): cannot coerce type 'closure' to vector of type 'character'
od = options()$digits
options(digits=3)
tail(ee$R)

#> Error in tail(ee$R): object 'ee' not found
options(digits=od)
